name.baseName: Dyeing ; Bamboo, rattan, palm, grass products ; Dyeing agent ; Color blending ; All sizes; NESPS2
染色 ; 竹、藤、棕、草制品 ; 染色剂 ; 调色 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Chemical Oxygen DemandisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Chemical Oxygen DemandisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了在竹子、藤、棕榈和草制品的生产中使用染色剂进行调色的过程。此过程适用于不同规模的生产，并且是为涉及染色天然纤维产品的行业而设计。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码20,三级代码204.0文件，在完整版文件中第385页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Water (river water from technosphere, waste water)

exchange.generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Water (river water from technosphere, waste water)didn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Bamboo, Rattan, Palm, and Grass Products

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为竹、藤、棕、草制品，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Chemical Oxygen DemandisChemical coagulation + floating separation + A2/O process + precipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝+上浮分离+A2/O艺+沉淀分离，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Chemical Oxygen DemandisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是直接排放，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
